puppeteer:Reinforcements.NAME: Reinforcements
puppeteer:Reinforcements.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! puppeteer:Summon_Shanghai into your hand.

puppeteer:Graze.NAME: Graze
puppeteer:Graze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a puppeteer:Summon_Shanghai into your hand.

puppeteer:Vanguard.NAME: Vanguard
puppeteer:Vanguard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The puppeteer:Doll closest to the enemy gains !M! puppeteer:Charge.

puppeteer:Spearhead.NAME: Spearhead
puppeteer:Spearhead.DESCRIPTION: The target puppeteer:Doll charges through the closest enemy, dealing damage equal to double its puppeteer:Charge.

puppeteer:DollActivation.NAME: Doll Activation
puppeteer:DollActivation.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! puppeteer:Summon_Shanghai into your hand. NL Exhaust.
puppeteer:DollActivation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! puppeteer:Summon_Hourai into your hand. NL Exhaust.

puppeteer:MaterialCollection.NAME: Material Collection
puppeteer:MaterialCollection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! puppeteer:Summon_Hourai into your hand.

puppeteer:Expand.NAME: Expand
puppeteer:Expand.DESCRIPTION: Add a puppeteer:Summon_Shanghai into your hand. NL Draw !M! cards.

puppeteer:LuminousDolls.NAME: Luminous Dolls
puppeteer:LuminousDolls.DESCRIPTION: ALL puppeteer:Dolls lose !M! puppeteer:Charge. NL ALL enemies lose Strength this turn equal to the puppeteer:Charge lost.

puppeteer:Deanimate.NAME: Deanimate
puppeteer:Deanimate.DESCRIPTION: puppeteer:Destroy a puppeteer:Doll. NL Gain Block equal to its puppeteer:Charge.
puppeteer:Deanimate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL puppeteer:Destroy a puppeteer:Doll. NL Gain Block equal to its puppeteer:Charge.

puppeteer:ToTheLimit.NAME: To The Limit
puppeteer:ToTheLimit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose !M! Dexterity. NL Gain [E] [E].

puppeteer:Transference.NAME: Transference
puppeteer:Transference.DESCRIPTION: puppeteer:Destroy a puppeteer:Doll. NL ALL puppeteer:Dolls gain puppeteer:Charge equal to its puppeteer:Charge. NL Exhaust.
puppeteer:Transference.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: puppeteer:Destroy a puppeteer:Doll. NL ALL puppeteer:Dolls gain puppeteer:Charge equal to its puppeteer:Charge.

puppeteer:SummonShanghai.NAME: Summon Shanghai
puppeteer:SummonShanghai.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL puppeteer:Summon a puppeteer:Shanghai_Doll. NL Exhaust.

puppeteer:SummonHourai.NAME: Summon Hourai
puppeteer:SummonHourai.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL puppeteer:Summon a puppeteer:Hourai_Doll. NL Exhaust.

puppeteer:CutStrings.NAME: Cut Strings
puppeteer:CutStrings.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive effect of a puppeteer:Doll !M! times and puppeteer:Destroy it.

puppeteer:GuardDolls.NAME: Guard Dolls
puppeteer:GuardDolls.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each active puppeteer:Doll.

puppeteer:Escalation.NAME: Escalation
puppeteer:Escalation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, gain [E] and draw !M! card.
puppeteer:Escalation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, gain [E] and draw !M! cards.

puppeteer:Perception.NAME: Perception
puppeteer:Perception.DESCRIPTION: If the closest enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block.

puppeteer:LemmingsParade.NAME: Lemmings' Parade
puppeteer:LemmingsParade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the closest enemy for each puppeteer:Doll puppeteer:Summoned this combat. NL Exhaust.

puppeteer:Pressure.NAME: Pressure
puppeteer:Pressure.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card costs 2 or more, deal !M! damage.

puppeteer:Entropy.NAME: Entropy
puppeteer:Entropy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Increase the cost of a card in your hand by 1 this combat.

puppeteer:Stockpile.NAME: Stockpile
puppeteer:Stockpile.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Increase their cost by 1 this turn.

puppeteer:ArtfulChant.NAME: ArtfulChant
puppeteer:ArtfulChant.DESCRIPTION: Increase the cost of a card in your hand by 1 this combat. NL The next time you play it, it is played twice.

puppeteer:Solitary.NAME: Solitary
puppeteer:Solitary.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL Increase the cost of ALL cards in your hand by 1 this combat.

puppeteer:DevilryLightRay.NAME: Devilry Light Ray
puppeteer:DevilryLightRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the total cost of cards in your hand.

puppeteer:GrandGuignol.NAME: Grand Guignol
puppeteer:GrandGuignol.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times this card's cost. NL Can be played as long as you have at least [E] .

puppeteer:ImmortalFlame.NAME: Immortal Flame
puppeteer:ImmortalFlame.DESCRIPTION: Whenever this card would leave your hand, return it and deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.
